source:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_SEQ_00Maru seems concerned about dental hygiene.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

スワルナの大蔵のマルルゥは、ヒッポの手入れをしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_TODO_00<tab>Place the rotting meat at the designated location.
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location and defeat the old pisaca when it appears.
target: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB6DD01 /var>で待機し、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22AD101 /var>が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the handful of tough pisaca scales to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_000<tab>Our hippos are all sweet softies, but behind those plump, whiskery lips, they're packin' serious tusks that need regular care.
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_000ヒッポは大人しくて温厚だけど、
牙を伸びたまま放置しておくと危ないんだよね。
だから、お手入れをしてあげたくてさ……。

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_001<tab>We like usin' pisaca scales to file 'em down, but pisaca scales have this tendency of comin' attached to pisaca. That's where you come in...
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_001そこで、ヒッポの牙に負けない硬さを持つ、
「ピシャーチャの鱗」を手に入れてきてほしいんだけど……
お願いしてもいい？

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_002<tab>If you leave this spoiled meat by their stampin' grounds, one's sure to come stampin'. Just make sure it ain't got brittle scales, okay? An old pisaca should have what you're lookin' for...
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_002この「」を置けば、とりわけ硬い鱗を持ってる、
がおびき出せるはず……。
任せたよー。

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_011<tab>Oh, these are perfect! Thanks for your help.
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_011うん、これならバッチリ。
どうもありがとー。

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_012<tab>So far as I know, pisaca scales are the only tool tough enough to handle Thavnairian hippo tusks. Wild hippos scrape theirs against giantsgall, but they can swallow bits of rock doin' that. Upsets their stomachs...
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_012ヒッポの牙は生涯伸び続けるんだけど、
サベネア島のヒッポたちは、牙が特別硬いから、
手入れが大変なんだよね……。

source: TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_013<tab>But thanks to you, Svarna's hippos will have shaved tusks an' healthy bellies! The keystones of hippo health. ...Probably.
target:
TEXT_BANARK119_04569_MARU_000_013野生のヒッポは、巨人石の岩に牙を擦り付けて削るんだけど、
それだと、破片が体内に入ってお腹を壊すことがあってさ。
だから、鱗で手入れしてあげるのが良いんだ。
